casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Christopher Blake SQUIRE. No. 422P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 5, 2016. Christopher Blake Squire, for Squire, Christopher Blake. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 18th of December 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Wake County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of January 2016."
